backend.src.app.services.equipments package

Submodules

backend.src.app.services.equipments.equipment_service module

class backend.src.app.services.equipments.equipment_service.EquipmentService(equipment_inventory_number, update_data=None)[source]

Bases: object

The EquipmentService class provides methods for managing equipment data.

This class acts as a service for validating, updating, deleting, and preparing data related to a piece of equipment.

Variables:

  • equipment_inventory_number – The inventory number of the equipment.

  • update_data – The data to update for the equipment.

  • equipment_repository – An instance of the EquipmentRepository class for interacting with equipment data.

delete_equipment()[source]

Delete the equipment.

This method uses the equipment repository to delete the equipment based on its inventory number.

prepare_response_with_equipment_data()[source]

Prepare a response containing all data about the equipment.

This method uses the equipment repository to retrieve all data about the equipment.

Returns:

A dictionary containing all data about the equipment.

Return type:

dict[str, any]

update_equipment_data()[source]

Update the equipment’s data.

This method uses the equipment repository to update the equipment’s data.

Returns:

True if the equipment was successfully updated, False otherwise.

Return type:

bool

update_equipment_status_as_damaged()[source]

Update the status of the equipment as damaged.

This method uses the equipment repository to update the status of the equipment.

validate_equipment()[source]

Validate the equipment’s existence.

This method uses the equipment repository to validate the existence of the equipment based on its inventory number.

Returns:

True if the equipment exists, False otherwise.

Return type:

bool

backend.src.app.services.equipments.equipments_service module

class backend.src.app.services.equipments.equipments_service.EquipmentsService(create_data=None)[source]

Bases: object

The EquipmentsService class provides methods for managing data for multiple pieces of equipment.

This class acts as a service for creating new pieces of equipment and preparing data related to all pieces of equipment.

Variables:

create_data – The data for creating a new piece of equipment.

create_equipment()[source]

Create a new piece of equipment.

This method uses the equipments repository to create a new piece of equipment with the provided data.

Returns:

True if the equipment was created, False otherwise. Returns False if no data was provided for creation.

Return type:

bool

prepare_response_with_equipments_data()[source]

Prepare a response containing data about all pieces of equipment.

This method uses the equipments repository to retrieve data about all pieces of equipment.

Returns:

A list of data about all pieces of equipment. Can be empty if no equipment objects were created.

Return type:

list[dict[str, any]]

backend.src.app.services.equipments.equipments_sort_service module

class backend.src.app.services.equipments.equipments_sort_service.EquipmentsSortService(sort_data)[source]

Bases: object

The EquipmentsSortService class provides a method to sort equipment data.

This class acts as a service for sorting data related to equipment.

sort_equipments()[source]

Sort equipment data based on the provided parameters.

This method uses the EquipmentsRepository to sort all equipment based on the sorting data, which was provided when this instance of the EquipmentsSortService was created.

Returns:

The sorted equipment data or None if the sort data wasn’t valid.

Return type:

list[dict[str, any]] or None
